descriptionNullable:
The dataset contains columns -
**Transaction data** - Date on which the transaction made
**bill ID**- ID number of transaction
**user ID**-  ID number of user who made the transaction
**line item amount** - amount of item
**item description** - Description of item
**inventory category** - category of item
**color**- colour of item
**size**- size of item
**zone_name**- name of zones where stores are located
**store name** - name of stores according to the zones
What can you do with this dataset - 
1) Perform data cleaning
2) Do some analysis and answer some questions like-
 a) What are the products with highest sales
 b) Which zone(s) has highest sales 
 c) How sales changed with time, etc.
 d) Perform clustering

I have also done some analysis .You can also check my work [here](https://www.kaggle.com/code/nishchay331/n5-retail-analysis-part-1). Please feel free to provide suggestions on improvements.
title: Clothes Retail Store
subtitle: Dataset about clothes retail store
description:

2) Do some analysis and answer some questions like-
